name: Singh
description: Singh Coin is a social media platform. It has two participants - first participant is a company who wants to do branding of its products and second participant is user who will create content and interact on social media. Company will create a campaign for its branding. Users will participate in the campaign and create content for the company and post on his/her wall. In return user will be rewarded with SINGH Token by the company. The SINGH token is tradeable on the exchange. That is how user will earn just by creating content on social
